column1: Little Goat Diner////Moving on to the food: come hungry. Unlike most hipster/trendy-places
column2: this place does not skimp on the food. I will note that the corned beef hash and eggs was very greasy
column3: but that's how it should be! You can't go wrong with anything on the menu. (I will say coffee for $4 is kind of insane
column4: but you cannot NOT have coffee with breakfast so I had to get coffee anyway.)
